sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule, NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { User, UserForm } from './user.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'User Management'; users: User[] = []; // Model bound to the form formModel: UserForm = this.getEmptyUser(); isEdit = false; private getEmptyUser(): UserForm { return { id: 0, name: '', age: null, track: '', email: '' }; } onSubmit(form: NgForm) { if (form.invalid) return; // defensively coerce age to number const ageNumber = Number(this.formModel.age); if (!Number.isFinite(ageNumber)) return; // should not happen due to validation const userPayload: User = { ...this.formModel, age: ageNumber } as User; if (this.isEdit) { // Update existing user const idx = this.users.findIndex(u => u.id === this.formModel.id); if (idx !== -1) this.users[idx] = { ...userPayload }; } else { // Create new user const nextId = this.users.length ? Math.max(...this.users.map(u => u.id)) + 1 : 1; this.users.push({ ...userPayload, id: nextId }); } this.reset(form); } edit(user: User) { // Convert to form model with nullable age this.formModel = { ...user, age: user.age }; this.isEdit = true; } delete(user: User) { this.users = this.users.filter(u => u.id !== user.id); // If deleting currently edited user, reset form if (this.isEdit && this.formModel.id === user.id) { this.isEdit = false; this.formModel = this.getEmptyUser(); } } reset(form?: NgForm) { this.isEdit = false; this.formModel = this.getEmptyUser(); form?.resetForm(); } }

{{ title }}

{{ isEdit ? 'Edit User' : 'Add User' }}
Name is required. Name must be at least 3 characters.
Age is required. Age must be greater than 18.
Track is required.
Email is required. Please enter a valid email address.
